items.title: Trump swears in Jeanine Pirro as top prosecutor in DC
items.description: President Donald Trump will swear in Jeanine Pirro as the interim U.S. attorney for D.C. during a ceremony in the Oval Office Wednesday afternoon.

items.title: Russia says Trump 'does not fully understand' after criticism of Putin
items.description: Hundreds of Ukrainian drones crossed into Russia overnight into Wednesday morning, dozens of which targeted Moscow.
